claim: Vaccination with a higher-dose recombinant flu vaccine may induce a more robust antibody response than egg-based standard-dose vaccines.

rejected_evidence.original_explanation: This quote identifies the recombinant HA vaccine (RIV4), which is relevant because the claim compares recombinant (higher-dose) vaccines to standard egg-based vaccines. However, the document does not provide explicit evidence or statements about antibody response or comparative immunogenicity between higher-dose recombinant and standard-dose egg-based vaccines.
